Chapter.Name: CHARTER OF THE UNITED NATIONS AND STATUTE OF THE INTERNATIONAL COURT OF JUSTICE

ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Amendments to Articles 23, 27 and 61 of the Charter of the United Nations, adopted by the General Assembly of the United Nations in resolutions 1991 A and B (XVIII) of 17 December 1963

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 31 August 1965, in accordance with article 108for all Members of the United Nations.
